metadata.title: Winco BSON-18, 18" Prime Stainless Steel Solid Basting Spoon, Mixing Spoon, Commercial Cooking Spoon Server, NSF
features: Made from 2 mm thick stainless steel, this basting spoon is strong enough to endure high temperatures without warping.
Featuring a reliable handle with hook, this cooking spoon provides an outstanding balance and ensures a secure grip while mixing or stirring hot dishes, sauces or soups.
Perfectly proportioned for cooking and serving, this 18-inch solid spoon will hold light or heavy dishes from broth to stew.

Great choice for basting hot food without burning yourself, this non-perforated stainless steel basting spoon is a top performer for busy restaurants, cafeterias, hotels and food serving establishments.
NSF certified. Easy to clean. Dishwasher safe.
description: Winco BSON-18, 18" Prime Stainless Steel Solid Basting Spoon, Mixing Spoon, Commercial Cooking Spoon Server, NSF, is a perfect item for all of your kitchen needs. Made from 2 mm thick stainless steel, this basting spoon is strong enough to endure high temperatures without warping. Featuring a reliable handle, this cooking spoon provides an outstanding balance and ensures a secure grip while mixing or stirring hot dishes, sauces or soups. Perfectly proportioned for cooking and serving, this 18-inch solid spoon will hold light or heavy dishes from broth to stew. Due to its stainless steel construction, the spoon is reliable and sturdy. Great choice for basting hot food without burning yourself, this non-perforated stainless steel basting spoon is a top performer for busy restaurants, cafeterias, hotels and food serving establishments.
